SOUL SACRIFICE is a four-piece Turkish metal band from the biggest city of Turkey, ISTANBUL. SOUL SACRIFICE using variety of sounds, including mostly death metal with modern melodic tunes, some oriented turkish melodies and mixture of different vocal types. The roots of the band goes back to 1997, 2003 means the start of the current line up.
